title: Trimming, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: silver metallic foil and silver metallic foil wound onto white silk
Technique: bobbin lace
creditline: Gift of Dr. Anthony S. Felsovanyi
description: Wide border of metallic silver lace in all-over small scale repeated diamond shape, divided at intervals with a stripe. Outer edge is scalloped.

tombstone.epitaph:

1750–1800. Medium: silver metallic foil and silver metallic foil wound onto white silk
